View Javadoc
1   package com.fns.xlator.cache;
2   
3   import org.springframework.boot.actuate.cache.DefaultCacheStatistics;
4   import org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.Metric;
5   import org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.dropwizard.DropwizardMetricServices;
6   import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnection;
7   import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnectionFactory;
8   import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisConnectionUtils;
9   import org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled;
10  
11  import java.util.List;
12  import java.util.Properties;
13  import java.util.stream.Collectors;
14  
15  public class RedisCacheMonitor {
16  
17      private final RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory;
18      private final DropwizardMetricServices metricServices;
19  
20      public RedisCacheMonitor(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory, DropwizardMetricServices metricServices) {
21          this.redisConnectionFactory = redisConnectionFactory;
22          this.metricServices = metricServices;
23      }
24  
25      @Scheduled(fixedDelay = 5000)
26      public void monitor() {
27          DefaultCacheStatistics statistics = new DefaultCacheStatistics();
28          // @see http://redis.io/commands/INFO
29          RedisConnection connection = RedisConnectionUtils.getConnection(this.redisConnectionFactory);
30          try {
31              Properties props = connection.info();
32              Long hitCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_hits"));
33              Long missCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_misses"));
34              statistics.setGetCacheCounts(hitCount, missCount);
35              // we do not currently have a way of calculating the cache size, so we have to filter
36              List<Metric<?>> metrics = statistics
37                                          .toMetrics("cache.")
38                                              .stream()
39                                                  .filter(f -> !f.getName().contains(".size"))
40                                                  .collect(Collectors.toList());
41              metrics.forEach(m -> metricServices.submit(m.getName(), (Double) m.getValue()));
42          } finally {
43              RedisConnectionUtils.releaseConnection(connection, this.redisConnectionFactory);
44          }
45      }
46  }
